languages.text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, all Toxin and Burning effects ignore Armour. All Bleeding effects' damage is increased by 30%.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} applied to the Executioner's enemies from any source ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The damage of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects applied to the Executioner's enemies from any source is increased by +30%.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} applied to the Executioner's enemies from any source ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The damage of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects applied to the Executioner's enemies from any source is increased by +30%.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, todos los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} que sufren los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}, provengan de donde provengan, ignoran la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de su objetivo. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de todos los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} que sufren, provengan de donde provengan, aumenta un +30 % adicional.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, todos los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} que sufren los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}, provengan de donde provengan, ignoran la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de su objetivo. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de todos los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} que sufren, provengan de donde provengan, aumenta un +30 % adicional.

Hasta el final del combate, todos los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} que sufren los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}, provengan de donde provengan, ignoran la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de su objetivo. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de todos los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} que sufren, provengan de donde provengan, aumenta un +30 % adicional.

languages.text: 戦闘が終了するまで、あらゆるソースから{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の敵に与えられたすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果は、そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を無視する。エクスキューショナーの敵が受けたあらゆるソースからのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}出血{/g}効果の{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}ダメージ{/g}は、追加で+30%増加する。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘が終了するまで、あらゆるソースから{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の敵に与えられたすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果は、そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を無視する。エクスキューショナーの敵が受けたあらゆるソースからのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}出血{/g}効果の{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}ダメージ{/g}は、追加で+30%増加する。

戦闘が終了するまで、あらゆるソースから{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の敵に与えられたすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果は、そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を無視する。あらゆるソースからエクスキューショナーの敵が受けたすべての{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}効果の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、追加で+30%増加する。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果影响时，该效果无论来源，会无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。当行刑者的敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果影响时，该效果无论来源，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}额外提高30%。上述效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果影响时，该效果无论来源，会无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。当行刑者的敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果影响时，该效果无论来源，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}额外提高30%。上述效果持续至战斗结束。

当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果影响时，该效果无论来源，会无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。当行刑者的敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果影响时，该效果无论来源，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}额外提高30%。上述效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes ignorieren alle {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Effekte beliebiger Herkunft, mit denen Gegner des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s belegt sind die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} ihrer Ziele. Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-Effekte beliebiger Herkunft, mit denen die Gegner des Henkers belegt sind, erhöht sich um weitere +30 %.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes ignorieren alle {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Effekte beliebiger Herkunft, mit denen Gegner des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s belegt sind die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} ihrer Ziele. Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-Effekte beliebiger Herkunft, mit denen die Gegner des Henkers belegt sind, erhöht sich um weitere +30 %.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligés aux ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de leur cible, et ce, quelle que soit leur source. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} infligés aux ennemis de l'exécuteur sont augmentés de +30 % supplémentaires, et ce, quelle que soit leur source.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects from any source inflicted on the Executioner's enemies is increased by an additional +30%.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligés aux ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Exécuteur{/g} ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} de leur cible, et ce, quelle que soit leur source. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} infligés aux ennemis de l'Exécuteur sont augmentés de +30 % supplémentaires, et ce, quelle que soit leur source.

Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligés aux ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Exécuteur{/g} ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} de leur cible, et ce, quelle que soit leur source. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} infligés aux ennemis de l'Exécuteur sont augmentés de +30 % supplémentaires, et ce, quelle que soit leur source.

languages.text: До конца боя все эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, наложенные на врагов {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} из любых источников, игнорируют {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} своих целей. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Урон{/g} от любого {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, наложенного на врагов палача из любых источников, увеличивается на 30% дополнительно.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted on the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s enemies from any source ignore their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effects inflicted on the Executioner's enemies from any source is increased by an additional +30%.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя все эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, наложенные на врагов {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} из любых источников, игнорируют {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} своих целей. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Урон{/g} от любого {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, наложенного на врагов палача из любых источников, увеличивается на 30% дополнительно.

До конца боя все эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, наложенные на врагов {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} из любых источников, игнорируют {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} своих целей. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Урон{/g} от любого {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, наложенного на врагов палача из любых источников, увеличивается на 30% дополнительно.
